description: Bright, art-filled, spacious loft in prime Williamsburg, Brooklyn (2 blocks from subway, 1 stop from Manhattan); King-size bed, walk-in shower, sit-n-spin tub, full bedroom, living room, kitchen, dining area, 12 foot high ceiling. Near lots of delicious eateries, cafes, music venues, nightlife, parks, yet on a quiet street. Perfect for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers. Classic artist loft in converted brick warehouse building. Possible use of private roof deck. 1st Flr-Eu, 2nd Fl-US
name: Art-filled bright spacious loft prime Wburg Brklyn
review: Great place in a buzzing little neighborhood, close to Manhattan but far enough away as well!
